channel.title: Just wondering
channel.description:
Is it possible to add an in game command which could be like a punishment log even if it was a interface or just a sendMessage thing. I think it would be useful for in game staff to use. It could show details like,
who was punished , for what reason, by whom, maybe their ip for admins only, how long the punishment is and how long until it finishes? All the useful stuff anyway.

item.title: Just wondering
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Pure_:

I would suggest you create a web interface, if you’re going to implement this into the game itself though consider creating an interface.

While you’re at it might as well convert all saving to MySQL.

Read full topic

@portugalrox wrote:

I would suggest you create a web interface, if you’re going to implement this into the game itself though consider creating an interface.

I agree.

item.title: Just wondering
item.dc:creator: @portugalrox portugalrox
item.description:
@portugalrox wrote:

Bl3nd:

I have seen some people use this command in their server. It can be done… if you know what you’re doing of course.

seems useful any clue how to add something like this?
